ygData.subject: Re: adjustments for Wizards?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... know ... According to what I ve heard, yes - D Vinn is Dorn s brother, not sure who is older though.  And I believe D Vinn is an ambassador of Neriak (or
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:13 PM 05/26/1999 -0300, you wrote:
>From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>BTW, it's Emperor Crush's castle. Dvinn is an ambassador, although I don't
know
>of who. The Dervishes, maybe? Maybe he's Dorn's older brother?

According to what I've heard, yes - D'Vinn is Dorn's brother, not sure who
is older though. And I believe D'Vinn is an ambassador of Neriak (or maybe
just the Indigo Brotherhood specifically). Rumor has it that he has a pet
running around in Befallen, though what a rogue is doing with a pet I have
no idea.

Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
Famous last words, "Hail D'Vinn!"
